parameters.name: WindowId
parameters.description: The ID of the maintenance window for which you want to retrieve information.

nested_items.name: WindowId
nested_items.description: The ID of the created maintenance window.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the maintenance window.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the maintenance window.

nested_items.name: StartDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in ISO-8601 Extended format, for when the maintenance window is scheduled to become active. The maintenance window won't run before this specified time.

nested_items.name: EndDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in ISO-8601 Extended format, for when the maintenance window is scheduled to become inactive. The maintenance window won't run after this specified time.

nested_items.name: Schedule
nested_items.description: The schedule of the maintenance window in the form of a cron or rate expression.

nested_items.name: ScheduleTimezone
nested_items.description: The time zone that the scheduled maintenance window executions are based on, in Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) format. For example: 'America/Los_Angeles', 'UTC', or 'Asia/Seoul'. For more information, see the Time Zone Database on the IANA website.

nested_items.name: ScheduleOffset
nested_items.description: The number of days to wait to run a maintenance window after the scheduled cron expression date and time.

nested_items.name: NextExecutionTime
nested_items.description: The next time the maintenance window will actually run, taking into account any specified times for the maintenance window to become active or inactive.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration of the maintenance window in hours.

nested_items.name: Cutoff
nested_items.description: The number of hours before the end of the maintenance window that Amazon Web Services Systems Manager stops scheduling new tasks for execution.

nested_items.name: AllowUnassociatedTargets
nested_items.description: Whether targets must be registered with the maintenance window before tasks can be defined for those targets.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the maintenance window is enabled.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date the maintenance window was created.

nested_items.name: ModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date the maintenance window was last modified.
